question: Which of the following statements are false regarding Egress-only IGWs?

answers.A: It ensures that the EC2 instances are accessible from the internet
answers.B: For enabling egress-only internet traffic, you only need to create an egress-only IGW in VPC
answers.C: It ensures that EC2 instances can communicate with the internet
answers.D: They work with IPv6 and IPv4 addresses
